about_the_game:
In this fantastical world full of wonders, a thrilling adventure is about to unfold!

The protagonist had the misfortune of being knocked flying by a large truck but miraculously reincarnated in another world. Under the guidance of the goddess, the protagonist embarked on the path of becoming a mage adventurer.

The gameplay is diverse and rich:

  • Open treasure chests for continuous surprises and obtain powerful equipment to enhance your strength.

  • Be brave to fight monsters, level up continuously, and gradually grow into a powerful adventurer.

  • Accept commissions from the Adventurers' Guild and challenge various difficult tasks.

  • The unique roguelike element, choose one of the three enhancement scrolls, and each choice determines your fate.

  • The elaborately designed skill tree system allows you to freely customize your development direction.

The game adopts the charming pixel style, integrates adventure, RPG and light roguelike elements, and takes you to experience the wonderful world similar to Castlevania. Here, you will follow the protagonist's footsteps, overcome difficulties and obstacles step by step, and finally defeat the demon king to write your own legend!

Come and join this fantasy adventure and start your journey in another world!
